roadmap.title: Fundamentals of Blockchain Technology
roadmap.description: Gain a solid understanding of blockchain concepts, including distributed ledger technology, cryptography, consensus mechanisms (Proof-of-Work, Proof-of-Stake), smart contracts, and different blockchain platforms (Ethereum, Hyperledger Fabric, Corda).
resources: Books ("Blockchain Basics" by Daniel Drescher, "Mastering Bitcoin" by Andreas M. Antonopoulos)

roadmap.title: Programming Skills for Blockchain
roadmap.description: Learn a programming language commonly used in blockchain development, such as Solidity (for Ethereum), JavaScript (for web3 development), or Python. Focus on data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming principles.

roadmap.title: Smart Contract Development
roadmap.description: Deepen your knowledge of smart contracts and practice writing, deploying, and testing them. Explore different development environments and tools like Remix, Truffle, and Hardhat.
resources: Participate in hackathons and coding challenges

roadmap.title: Decentralized Application (DApp) Development
roadmap.description: Learn how to build decentralized applications that interact with smart contracts and blockchain networks.  Focus on front-end development using web3 libraries and frameworks.
resources: Build and deploy your own DApp projects

roadmap.title: Blockchain Platforms and Tools
roadmap.description: Explore different blockchain platforms beyond Ethereum, such as Hyperledger Fabric, Corda, or Polkadot.  Familiarize yourself with relevant tools for blockchain development, testing, and deployment.
resources: Cloud-based blockchain services (AWS Blockchain, Azure Blockchain)

roadmap.title: Build a Portfolio and Network
roadmap.description: Create a portfolio of blockchain projects to showcase your skills and experience.  Network with other blockchain developers and attend industry events to learn about the latest trends and job opportunities.
